messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. This is Adam speaking. May I know your name, please?
It's George. Where is my Nespresso Coffee Capsule delivery? It's been weeks!
Hello George, I'm really sorry to hear about the delay. Let me check the status of your delivery right away. Can you please provide your order number?
Order number? It's 987654. This is ridiculous, I paid for expedited shipping!

I understand your frustration, George. I'm pulling up your order details now. It appears there was a delay at our warehouse. I apologize for the inconvenience. Your order should arrive within the next 2 days.
Next 2 days? That's unacceptable! I need my coffee now!
I truly apologize, George. To make up for this delay, I can offer you a 20% discount on your next purchase. Will that be acceptable?
A discount? What good is that if I can't get my coffee when I need it? I want a refund on the shipping cost!

I can understand your frustration, George. I will process a refund for the shipping cost immediately and ensure your package is prioritized for delivery. You should receive the refund confirmation shortly.
Fine. This better not happen again.
I assure you, George, we will do everything we can to prevent this from happening in the future. Thank you for your patience, and again, I apologize for the inconvenience.
